mapper.sql:
a.id AS "id", a.price_cutoff_date AS "priceCutoffDate", a.price_insert_date AS "priceInsertDate", a.medical_code AS "sicmedMedical.id", a.price_enter AS "priceEnter", a.price_sale AS "priceSale", a.insert_user AS "insertUser", a.insert_dept AS "insertDept", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag",
b.medical_name_china AS "sicmedMedical.medicalNameChina", b.medical_code AS "sicmedMedical.medicalCode"
LEFT JOIN sicmed_medical b ON b.id = a.medical_code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sicmed_medical_price( id, price_cutoff_date, price_insert_date, medical_code, price_enter, price_sale, insert_user, insert_dept, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{priceCutoffDate}, #{priceInsertDate}, #{sicmedMedical.id}, #{priceEnter}, #{priceSale}, #{insertUser}, #{insertDept}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sicmed_medical_price SET price_cutoff_date = #{priceCutoffDate}, price_insert_date = #{priceInsertDate}, medical_code = #{sicmedMedical.id}, price_enter = #{priceEnter}, price_sale = #{priceSale}, insert_user = #{insertUser}, insert_dept = #{insertDept}, del_flag = #{delFlag}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
